fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Turn on someone's light, roleblocking them and all their visitors until they waste a night to turn off their light.
You also can cut someone's power, taking one charge of any limited-use abilities they have.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Gain an extra hour to create roles. This applies to everyone in the game.
With the Necronomicon, you can turn someone into a moth, which will kill them if their light is on, or if they visit someone whose light is on.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Coven goal and also spite wolfi
